data:
## constant_createModal
> `const` **createModal**: [`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<[`ModalWidget`](#modalwidget)\>


Creates a new modal widget instance.

### Param

config of the modal, either as a store or as an object containing values or stores.

### Returns

a new modal widget instance

## function_getModalDefaultConfig
> **getModalDefaultConfig**(): [`ModalProps`](#modalprops)


Returns a copy of the default modal config.

### Returns

[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)

a copy of the default modal config

## interface_ModalApi

API of the modal widget.

### Properties

#### patch

> **patch**: (`parameters`) => `void`


Method to change some modal properties.

Modify the parameter values, and recalculate the stores accordingly

##### Parameters

###### parameters

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<`Props`\>

##### Returns

`void`

### Methods

#### close

> **close**(`result?`): `void`


Closes the modal with the given result.

##### Parameters

###### result?

`any`

result of the modal, as passed in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the event passed to the
[onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler (and possibly changed by it) and resolved by the promise returned by the [open](#open) method.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### open

> **open**(): [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>


Opens the modal and returns a promise that is resolved when the modal is closed.
The resolved value is the result passed to the [close](#close) method and possibly changed by the
[onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>

## interface_ModalBeforeCloseEvent

Type of the parameter of [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose).

### Properties

#### cancel

> **cancel**: `boolean`


Whether to cancel the close of the modal.
It can be changed from the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler.

***

#### result

> **result**: `any`


Result of the modal, which is the value passed to the [close](#modalapi-close) method
and later resolved by the promise returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method.
If needed, it can be changed from the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler.

## constant_modalCloseButtonClick
> `const` **modalCloseButtonClick**: unique `symbol`


Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method, when the modal is closed by a click on the close button.

## constant_modalCloseEscape
> `const` **modalCloseEscape**: unique `symbol`


Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method, when the modal is closed by pressing the Escape key.

## interface_ModalDirectives

Directives of the modal widget.

### Properties

#### backdropDirective

> **backdropDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Directive to put on the backdrop DOM element.

***

#### backdropPortalDirective

> **backdropPortalDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Portal directive to put on the backdrop DOM element.

***

#### closeButtonDirective

> **closeButtonDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Directive that adds all the necessary attributes to the close button

***

#### dialogDirective

> **dialogDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Directive to apply to the dialog element when using the native [HTMLDialogElement](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLDialogElement)

***

#### modalDirective

> **modalDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Directive to put on the modal DOM element.

***

#### modalPortalDirective

> **modalPortalDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Portal directive to put on the modal DOM element.

## constant_modalOutsideClick
> `const` **modalOutsideClick**: unique `symbol`


Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method, when the modal is closed by a click inside the viewport but outside the modal.

## interface_ModalProps

Properties of the modal widget.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`


Whether the modal and its backdrop (if present) should be animated when shown or hidden.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`


Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### backdrop

> **backdrop**: `boolean`


Whether a backdrop should be created behind the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `string`


Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropTransition

> **backdropTransition**: [`TransitionFn`](../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)


The transition to use for the backdrop behind the modal (if present).

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### closeButton

> **closeButton**: `boolean`


Whether to display the close button.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### closeOnOutsideClick

> **closeOnOutsideClick**: `boolean`


Whether the modal should be closed when clicking on the viewport outside the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### container

> **container**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)


Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### modalTransition

> **modalTransition**: [`TransitionFn`](../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)


The transition to use for the modal.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onBeforeClose

> **onBeforeClose**: (`event`) => `void`


Event to be triggered when the modal is about to be closed (i.e. the [close](#modalapi-close) method was called).

##### Parameters

###### event

[`ModalBeforeCloseEvent`](#modalbeforecloseevent)

event giving access to the argument given to the [close](#modalapi-close) method and allowing
to cancel the close process.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`


Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is not visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`


Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`


Event to be triggered when the visible property changes.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

new value of the visible propery

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`


Whether the modal should be visible when the transition is completed.

##### Default Value

`false`

## interface_ModalState

State of the modal widget.

### Properties

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`


Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `string`


Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropHidden

> **backdropHidden**: `boolean`


Whether the backdrop is fully hidden. This can be true either because [backdrop](#modalprops-backdrop) is false or
because [visible](#modalprops-visible) is false and there is no current transition.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### closeButton

> **closeButton**: `boolean`


Whether to display the close button.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### container

> **container**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)


Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`


Whether the modal is fully hidden.

***

#### modalElement

> **modalElement**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)


DOM element of the modal.

***

#### transitioning

> **transitioning**: `boolean`


Whether there is an active transition to either display or hide the modal.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`


Whether the modal should be visible when the transition is completed.

##### Default Value

`false`
